name: Unknown Dungeon Beta
description:
You have been thrown to the deep abyss of the Unknown Dungeon, where You have to survive or die. There is no try. Unknown Dungeon is merciless roguelike dungeon crawler where you can loot different materials to craft strong Armors and Dangerous Weapons to help You go deeper floors of the Unknown Dungeon and maybe uncover it's mysteries.

Controls :

- Arrows - Move

- Space - Action

- Esc - Inventory

- Tab - Mini map
